messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone COME TO THE BRIDGE AND PROTECT ME

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WIZARD DETECTED ALSO BRING ME ALOT OF CIGARRETES AND LIQUOR BECAUSE I CANT TAKE THE FUCKING STRESS

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: BBBRIIINNG ME CIGARRETEch AND 'LIQooUUR ah'T BRIDGGGE

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WIZARD INVADED BRIDGE,AND MY ID IS GONE

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Did someone leave the stove on? 
 Or did my darling just walk by? (Did she just walk by?) 
She's hotter than a bright July 
She is my cutie pie (She's my cutie pie) 
Did someone turn the heat up? 
 Or did my love walk in the room? (Did she walk in the room?
Oh, just a little whiff of her perfume 
Makes my heart go boom! 
Let's strike a match, my dear! (Oh my dear) 
Set your damper to be open wide (Open wide) 
Let the passion warm you up inside 
It's the flames of love (It's the flames of love) 
You're such a catch, my dear! (Oh my dear) 
I wanna get with you and lose control (Lose control) 
So let's throw another piece of coal 
On the flames of love
